TopicTitle: IVA bug, Game accelerates when close to ground

Articles.Content: I've seen this now in 1.05 and 1.1.2, playing stock so I decided to use the IVA radar altimeter to check my alt. I've discovered that at less than 5000m-ish the needle moves super fast, crashing my craft into Kerbin's surface. Basically, grab a pod, chute, and Flea, shoot it sidewards, and go into IVA view. Anyone else experience this?
